_source.text: A few weeks later my wife decided it was time for the Sony CRT to go so we replaced it with a Sony Bravia 3D LED LCD and it too is surprisingly good for a LCD and it's internet capability is better than the Panasonic, I reckon it is still pipped by the Panasonic in terms of picture quality though.
